testsuite.name: Scenario: Mobile Recharge - Postpaid

testcase.name: When user selects the language as English
And user clicks on continue button
Then user should be able to see Login Screen
When user chooses to recharge for postpaid mobile
And user selects postpaid
testcase.failure: java.lang.AssertionError at org.junit.Assert.fail(Assert.java:86) at org.junit.Assert.assertTrue(Assert.java:41) at org.junit.Assert.assertTrue(Assert.java:52) at steps.MobileRechargeSteps.user_selects_postpaid(MobileRechargeSteps.java:22) at ✽.And user selects postpaid(RechargeMobile.feature:19)

testcase.name: And user enters mobile number as 9901897419
And user waits for mobile operator to be auto selected
And user chooses to recharge with Rs. 30
And user clicks on proceed button
